meta.description: Buy airport lounge access. Learn how to access Frankfurt Airport (FRA) lounges with a day pass, airline status, membership, or credit card.

location.terminalDirections: Arriving by car follow the signs to the departure level of Terminal 1. Before you reach Terminal 1 turn right towards the First Class Terminal.
Next to Gate A13, Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop.
Near Gate A26, proceed one level up to the entrance.
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, next to Gate A13.
Next to Gate A26
Level 2, opposite the Duty Free Shop, towards Gate A50.
Level 3, near Gate B43.
Located behind Airport Entrance 13 (Tor 13) when arriving by car.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B24-B28 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
After Passport Control, proceed towards Gates B44-B48 and take the lift or stairs to the lounge entrance.
Departure Area B, next to Gate B22.
Departure Area B, opposite Gate B42, next to Gate B43.
Outside of Passport Control and Security Checkpoint, Arrival Area B, immediately behind the Baggage Claim.
Landside, between Concourses B and C on the Gallery Level, next to the Travel Market (Reisemarkt).
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gates C14-C15.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Departure Area C, near Gate C14 and Gate C15.
Level 4, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
Level 3, opposite the Duty Free Shop towards Gate Z50.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, between Gates D26 and D27.

lounges.name: Japan Airlines JAL First Class Lounge

location.terminalDirections: After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Level 3.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Level 3, across from Gates D5 and D6.
Level 3, near Gate 8.
After Passport Control of the Non-Schengen area in Concourse E near Gates E5-E9 on Level 3. Located before the final Gate Security Checkpoint.
Level 3, near Gates E6-E9.
After Passport Control but before final Security Checkpoint, Level 3, next to Gate E6.
